name: Firepower (V)
Lore: '''About twenty guns. Some on the surface, some on the towers.''',
Text: 'Plays on table. If opponent moves from a location you occupy during your turn, they lose 2 Force. At end of opponent''s turn, if you control two battlegrounds (a site and system) and opponent deployed a card with ability and did not initiate a battle, you may retrieve 1 Force.',
